Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute near 103rd/Prospect
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses temp. rerouted WB: 103rd, Prospect, 99th, Longwood and 103rd; EB: 103rd, Longwood, 99th, Prospect and 103rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 103rd/Prospect due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 103rd, Prospect, 99th, Longwood and 103rd.

Eastbound buses will operate via 103rd, Longwood, 99th, Prospect and 103rd.

Allow extra travel time.
